ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Sure I ll look you up when I m back stateside and able to play again, hopefully I ll see you there, take care! ... From: Saaxton
ygData.messageBody:
Sure I'll look you up when I'm back stateside and able to play again,
hopefully I'll see you there, take care!

-----Original Message-----
From: Saaxton [mailto:saaxton_@...]
Sent: Friday, August 08, 2003 1:55 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Server


I play on Ayonae Ro as well. Look me up sometime...although i'm usually not
on until the wee hours of the morning, you never know...you might catch me
on early.

Shintak ShaarKahl
Vah Shir Warrior of the 22nd Season

Vraanel
